description: Heavily-burned zombie dinosaur predator that still reeks of charred meat.  Its flesh has mended into a leathery shell.
Heavily-burned zombie dinosaur predator that still reeks of charred meat.  Its flesh has mended into a leathery shell studded with bony spikes.
